title: Origin Story Michael Mørkøv: Son of TV Repairman to Olympic Champion, ‘I had to Fight for Everything’
content:
First bike, first win, first contract: Mørkøv's unlikely rise to become the peloton's most dangerous leadout man and Madison gold medalist.

Read the full article at Origin Story Michael Mørkøv: Son of TV Repairman to Olympic Champion, ‘I had to Fight for Everything’ on Velo.
author: ahood
